text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in AdministrativeContactRoleType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in RoleClassContactCode
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode

name: ContactRoleType
title: ContactRoleType
description: Types of contact for Role code "CON"
